title: I swear to heavenly earth if i get a leaver buster because of server failure ** READ MORE **
body:
pls riot. 

my friends JUST won at 6;10pm CST
the other team had like 3-4 DCs too.
riots fun system says 
"You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors."
and got a timer ; )

dont
let
your
system
punish
ME OR OTHERS FOR THIS.

#sad.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
